thread.title: "Done. No more Goldberg. I don't want to see him," says analyst in angry rant after WWE Saturday Night's Main Event

author: Abhilash Mendhe
title: "Done. No more Goldberg. I don't want to see him," says analyst in angry rant after WWE Saturday Night's Main Event
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? "Done. No more Goldberg. I donâ€™t want to see him," says analyst in angry rant after WWE Saturday Night's Main Event Discuss Now Goldberg delivering a speech after his last match [Image via WWE.com] Many people are unhappy with Goldberg 's recent comments targeting WWE, including analyst and Busted Open host Dave LaGreca. He didn't mince his words while blasting the veteran for expressing unhappiness with his retirement match at Saturday Night's Main Event.
Ad Goldberg is upset with how WWE handled his retirement run and expressed his frustrations in an interview with Ariel Helwani. Many fans are now calling him ungrateful for complaining about his final match.
Busted Open 's host, Dave LaGreca, went on a heated rant as well, targeting the WWE Hall of Famer for his comments on Ariel Helwani's show. He made it clear that he never wanted to see him again.
â€œIn principle, itâ€™s my last match, but you know, itâ€™s wrestling. Really? Youâ€™re done. D, O, N, E, done. No more Goldberg. I donâ€™t want to see him. I donâ€™t want to hear from him.â€ [H/T Wrestling News ] Ad Trending These WWE segments are not for kids - Watch here ðŸ˜
Ad Dave LaGreca won't let Goldberg ruin his birthday During the same episode of Busted Open , LaGreca also said the former World Heavyweight Champion has ruined a lot of things for him over the years, but he won't let him ruin his birthday.
Check out his comment below:
â€œI was getting so angry. Iâ€™m like, I canâ€™t let this guy ruin my birthday. Heâ€™s ruined so many things for me throughout the course of the last 25 years. Heâ€™s not ruining my birthday. So I turned it offâ€¦ I was getting nauseous. The dinner I had, the ice cream I had celebrating my birthday, I was about to vomit all over the fâ€”ing floor because of this as*hole.â€ [H/T Wrestling News ] Ad Dave LaGreca didn't hold back one bit while targeting the WWE veteran on Busted Open. It remains to be seen if the legend will notice the the rant and respond. He has also received massive support from his ardent fans, who believe WWE did him dirty on his way out.

Abhilash Mendhe is a pro wrestling journalist at Sportskeeda with nearly five years of experience. He completed his MBA from the Symbiosis Institute of Telecom Management in 2016 and worked with multiple banking institutions, including Tech Mahindra. While he started writing WWE articles for Sportskeeda in 2019 as a hobby, it eventually became a significant part of his professional journey.
Abhilash checks his articles thrice before sending them to the editing team, ensuring his work is highly accurate and reliable.
He has interviewed prominent pro wrestling personalities like Noam Dar, Angry Miz Girl, Brendan Cobbina, and Jesse Lambert. Abhilash is a big fan of AEW star Orange Cassidy, as he believes the former International Championâ€™s on-screen gimmick of an extremely lazy guy resonates with him.
Given the opportunity to script WWEâ€™s next big storyline, Abhilash would treat fans to the second installment of The Bloodline Civil War. He would book Roman Reigns to re-form The Bloodline with The Usos and Sami Zayn upon his comeback. The angle would see The Tribal Chief-led group go head-to-head with The Rock, Solo Sikoa, Tama Tonga, and Jacob Fatu in a blockbuster family feud.
When not reporting on pro wrestling, Abhilash likes to work out, go on walks, read, and explore new eateries.
